sub_title: Economics Teacher at ROC Horizon College
summary:
Hello, and welcome on my profile!

My specializations are: Commerce & Economics, Coaching & Training, and Planning & Strategy.

My interests are: Music, Sports, and Technology.

Mission: "Aspiring (commercial-economic) individuals, teams, and organization - to let them inspire the international society."

Feel free to contact me:
• Mail: sonnyvankooten@gmail.com
• Phone: (0031)6 41 73 80 80

school.name: TIAS School for Business and Society

profile_positions.description:
ROC Horizon College is a school with more than 1,200 employees, responsible for more than 11,000 students. Services, Economics, Healthcare, Business, Technics and Health are the domains of vocational-, adult-, continued general adult- and contract-activities education. ROC Horizon College has 4 locations: Alkmaar, Heerhugowaard, Hoorn and Purmerend.

As a Mentor you are responsible of the class. Tasks of a Mentor:
• You analyze and monitor the performance of the students.
• You discuss the performance and status with the students.
• You inform the teachers of the program about progress and status of the students.
• You report to the Coordinator and the Program Manager.

Skills and qualities: analyzing, communication and pedagogical.
profile_positions.title: Mentor

profile_positions.description:
ROC Horizon College is a school with more than 1,200 employees, responsible for more than 11,000 students. Services, Economics, Healthcare, Business, Technics and Health are the domains of vocational-, adult-, continued general adult- and contract-activities education. ROC Horizon College has 4 locations: Alkmaar, Heerhugowaard, Hoorn and Purmerend.

As a Teacher you are responsible of the lectures. Tasks of a Teacher:
• You give Financial & Administration-lectures (Business Economics and Excel).
• You give ICT-lectures (Digital Skills and ICT).
• You give Marketing & Communications-lectures (Communications and Market Research).
• You give other lectures (Bachelor Preparation and Entrepreneurship).
• You report to the Coordinator and the Program Manager.

Skills and qualities: didactic, pedagogical and professional knowledge.
profile_positions.title: Teacher

profile_positions.description:
ROC Horizon College is a school with more than 1,200 employees, responsible for more than 11,000 students. Services, Economics, Healthcare, Business, Technics and Health are the domains of vocational-, adult-, continued general adult- and contract-activities education. ROC Horizon College has 4 locations: Alkmaar, Heerhugowaard, Hoorn and Purmerend.

As a Coordinator you are responsible of the program. Tasks of a Coordinator:
• You maintain various relationships inside and outside the school with stakeholders.
• You coordinate applications of students, and exams, open days, school timetables, et cetera.
• You coordinate the planning of teachers, and improvements, meetings, work schedules, et cetera.
• You report to the Program Manager.

Skills and qualities: coordinating, leadership and management.
profile_positions.title: Coördinator

profile_positions.description:
UP – Coaching & Training is an organization who coaches and trains (commercial-economic) organizations, teams and individuals.  Our mission: "Aspiring individuals, teams and organizations. To inspire the international society.". Our vision: "Being the best international inspiring aspiration.".

profile_positions.title: Owner

profile_positions.description:
Makro The Netherlands has 17 wholesale stores in The Netherlands. The organization has a food and non-food assortment with more than 50,000 articles under one roof. Makro wants her customers to give a easier and extensive package with products and services. Makro offers work to more than 5,400 employees. Makro The Netherlands is part of the METRO Cash & Carry International.

As a Department Assistant you are responsible of the department. Tasks of a Department Assistant:
• You lead your team daily and coach them to a higher level.
• You give the best advice and service to customers.
• You maintain the stock level and make changes if needed.
• You maintain the presentation of your department.
• You are end responsible if the Department Manager is not present.

Skills and qualities: leading, overview & insight and planning.
profile_positions.title: Department Assistant

profile_positions.description:
iCentre TV is the platform with products for customers of Apple: Apple Watch, iPad, iPhone, Mac and related accessories. iCentre TV is supporting customers with their buying proces with information, reviews and videos which can be consulted via different channels.

As a Projectmanager of iCentre TV you are responsible of branding iCentre with videos. Tasks of a Projectmanager of iCentre TV:
• You communicate with the management, marketing department and presenters.
• You design the videos together with the marketing department.
• You organize the auditions, recordings and others events.
• You plan the program together with the marketing department.
• You recruit and select the team of iCentre TV.

Skills and qualities: communicating, organizing and planning.
profile_positions.title: Projectmanager iCentre TV

profile_positions.description:
iCentre is an Apple Premium Reseller specializing in solutions for Apple products. iCentre was founded at 1988 and has more than 20 shops throughout the Netherlands and is the biggest Apple Premium Reseller in the Netherlands. iCentre serves the consumer-, business- and education market.

As a Trainer you are responsible for the development of customers and the instore sales team. Tasks of a Trainer:
• You are the first point of contact in the case of product/sales knowledge and experience development.
• You create content for iSetup-sessions, iLearn-workshops, iPersonal-sessions and iSpecials-events.
• You organize and plan coaching-sessions, training-workshops and other instore-events.
• You report to the Store Manager.
• You take care of the communication towards the customers and the instore sales team.

Skills and qualities: didatic skills, organizing & planning and presenting.
profile_positions.title: Trainer

profile_positions.description:
Relevant Holdings believes that everyone should benefit from the potential of telecommunications, in the way that is the most relevant for him or her. While customers expect objective, transparent and understandable advice with excellent and reliable service.

As a Sales Coach you are responsible for the development of the 8 sales teams of different retail-chains (Dixons, iCentre, Media Markt, Optie1 and Phone House). Tasks of a Sales Coach:
• You are the first point of contact on the subject of sales coaching.
• You coach the sales teams in your district.
• You coach the Store Managers of the stores.
• You report to the Store Managers of the stores.
• You report to the Learning & Development Principal.

Skills and qualities: coach by objectives, strategic and visionair.
profile_positions.title: Sales Coach

profile_positions.description:
Media Markt is part of the METRO Group and was founded in 1979. Media Markt is a store where customers can purchase everything in the field of electronics under one roof. Innovation, renewal and change are part of the philosophy of Media Markt.

As a Sales Coach you are responsible for the sales team development of the store. Tasks of a Sales Coach:
• You are the first point of contact on the subject of sales coaching.
• You coach a sales team of 50+ employees.
• You coach 3 Floor Managers.
• You report to the Store Director.
• You take care of human resources with a Management Assistant.

Skills and qualities: coach by objectives, strategic and visionair.
profile_positions.title: Sales Coach

profile_positions.description:
Media Markt is part of the METRO Group and was founded in 1979. Media Markt is a store where customers can purchase everything in the field of electronics under one roof. Innovation, renewal and change are part of the philosophy of Media Markt.

As a Sales Manager you are responsible for the sales of the store. Tasks of a Sales Manager:
• You are the first point of contact on the subject of sales.
• You manage a sales team of 50+ employees indirect, by managing 3 Floor Managers direct.
• You manage to achieve qualitative (NPS and store image) and quantitate (revenue and services) objectives.
• You report to the Store Director.
• You take care of human resources with a Management Assistant.

Skills and qualities: manage by objectives, strategic and visionair.
profile_positions.title: Sales Manager

profile_positions.description:
XEU.com develops software solutions for large and medium sized organizations. XEU.com also sells other carefully selected international software solutions such as eComStation, iBANC, Netop: Classroom Management & Remote Control, SMS Passcode and Tricerat. XEU.com has grown quickly since 2013 and now provides software and support to 18,000 organizations.

As Accounting & Control you are responsible of the finance of XEU.com SBU's: eComStation, iBANC, Netop: Classroom Management & Remote Control, SMS Passcode and Tricerat. Tasks of Accounting & Control:
• You manage the debtors.
• You process financial transactions.
• You process grants (WBSO).
• You process (credit) invoices.
• You report to the SBU's and the Director.

Skills and qualities: accurate, develop more productive workflows and maintain overview.
profile_positions.title: Accounting & Control

profile_positions.description:
XEU.com develops software solutions for large and medium sized organizations. XEU.com also sells other carefully selected international software solutions such as eComStation, iBANC, Netop: Classroom Management & Remote Control, SMS Passcode and Tricerat. XEU.com has grown quickly since 2013 and now provides software and support to 18,000 organizations.

As an Account Manager you are responsible of sales and marketing of Netop-software: Classroom Management (Education and Corporate Training). Tasks of an Account Manager:
• You are the first point of incoming and outcoming contact with: customers, partners and vendors.
• You develop business, marketing and sales plans on strategic, tactic and operational level.
• You give product demonstrations and trainings on-site and via online channels.
• You manage the activities, debtors, pipeline and results via a self build dashboard-spreadsheet.
• You spot new opportunities analyzing the external and internal environment.

Skills and qualities: personal contact, proactive and relations.
profile_positions.title: Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
The Apple Solutions Consultant has the following responsibilities to fulfill as they relate to three different audiences:

1. Customer
The most important role that the Apple Solutions Consultant serves is that of providing an excellent Apple Customer Experience. Responsibilities include:
• Promoting Apple products and solutions by communicating the benefits and values of the products through product demonstrations.
• Conducting 1:1 and 1:many (where applicable) product demonstrations using world wide developed demo scripts for guidance.
• Building a community of loyal Apple customers who will come back to consult the Apple Solutions Consultant on future Apple purchases.

2. Apple Shop
The Apple Solution Consultant operates as a brand ambassador of the Apple shop. As such, it is the Apple Solutions Consultant’s responsibility to maintain the quality and appearance of the Apple shop in order to give the customer and reseller the best possible Apple experience according to Apple standards. Responsibilities include:
• Ensuring all merchandising elements (including demo content, as well as all 2D and 3D elements) are up to date and follow Apple world wide standards.
• Providing daily care and maintaining tidiness according to worldwide guidelines, also submitting maintenance requests when needed through iForms/Xpedex (or equivalents).
• Flag to his or her manager any maintenance issues with any Apple merchandizing execution in the store.

3. Apple Corporate/Manager
The Apple Solutions Consultant is able to provide key insights on the Apple business in a singular storefront, and identify business opportunities. Responsibilities include:
• Monitoring performance results and inventory levels.
• Monitoring regular competitive/trend tracking.
• Providing insightful feedback that will help to further develop and improve upon Apple shop performance.
profile_positions.title: Apple Solutions Consultant

profile_positions.description:
iCentre is an Apple Premium Reseller specializing in solutions for Apple products. iCentre was founded at 1988 and has more than 20 shops throughout the Netherlands and is the biggest Apple Premium Reseller in the Netherlands. iCentre serves the consumer-, business- and education market.

As a Shift Leader you are responsible for the shop. Tasks of a Shift Leader:
• You are the first point of contact in the case of conflicts.
• You open and close the shop and the POS-system.
• You manage your team.
• You report to the Area Stores Manager.
• You take care of the daily targets with a morning call, schedules and workshops for customers.

Skills and qualities: driven, good at handeling stress and people manager.
profile_positions.title: Shift Leader

profile_positions.description:
iCentre is an Apple Premium Reseller specializing in solutions for Apple products. iCentre was founded at 1988 and has more than 20 shops throughout the Netherlands and is the biggest Apple Premium Reseller in the Netherlands. iCentre serves the consumer-, business- and education market.

As a Sales Advisor you inform and advise customers in a professional and personal manner. Tasks of a Sales Advisor:
• You are meet daily targets and maintain the merchandising.
• You fulfill customers needs.
• You open and close the shop.

Skills and qualities: customer friendly, service oriented and team player.
profile_positions.title: Sales Advisor

profile_positions.description:
Media Markt is part of the METRO Group and was founded in 1979. Media Markt is a store where customers can purchase everything in the field of electronics under one roof. Innovation, renewal and change are part of the philosophy of Media Markt.

As an Apple Product Professional you are responsible of the sales and merchandising of Apple products and accessories. Tasks of an Apple Product Professional:
• You advise and deliver great service.
• You approach customers in an active and friendly way.
• You are responsible for an orderly department.
• You are responsible for keeping the stocks, presentation and prices up-to-date in your department.
• You fulfill customers needs and give solid product information.

Skills and qualities: friendly, pro-active and service oriented.
profile_positions.title: Apple Product Professional
